content: Hello, I'm looking to start contributing and I found this issue that looks like a good first issue to start with. Does anyone have some tips for me getting started on this one?

Hello! The entry point is https://github.com/rust-analyzer/rust-analyzer/blob/master/crates/ide/src/typing/on_enter.rs and there's some doc comment parsing code in e.g. crates/ide/src/doc_links.rs, but I don't know if that's enough to get started
